top_items.author: @steipete

title.en-US: Joke about EnterpriseClaw with Java 21, Spring Boot, 2GB Docker, 45s startup
title.zh-CN: OpenClaw创始人讽刺性提议做「EnterpriseClaw」：Java 21 + Spring Boot + 14个抽象工厂bean + 2GB镜像 + 45秒启动，嘲讽企业级过度工程

summary.en-US: 系统复杂度哲学 + 极简 vs 过度工程
summary.zh-CN: 超高互动量（1402赞），创始人亲自发声，完美契合「不造奇观，建系统」的哲学——复杂度堆叠是负债而非资产

top_items.relevance: 系统复杂度哲学 + 极简 vs 过度工程
top_items.suggested_angle: 这是「建系统」的反向警示——真正的系统复利来自简洁，而非Enterprise级别的抽象层。OpenClaw的轻量恰恰是「势」的体现：快启动、低资源、高迭代。复杂的架构是新手追求奇观，高手保持极简。

js_take.en-US: This is exactly why "build systems, not spectacles" matters. Complexity is debt—OpenClaw's lightweight approach is the real "enterprise" strategy. Fast iteration beats heavy architecture every time.
js_take.zh-CN: This is exactly why "build systems, not spectacles" matters. Complexity is debt—OpenClaw's lightweight approach is the real "enterprise" strategy. Fast iteration beats heavy architecture every time.

top_items.author: @shiri_shh

title.en-US: OpenClaw for local business websites automation
title.zh-CN: 用OpenClaw自动为本地商家生成网站：从Google Business抓取信息，自动生成网站，邮件发送预览+付款链接

summary.en-US: OpenClaw商业化 - 本地商家自动化服务
summary.zh-CN: 2669赞4425收藏的超高价值内容，展示OpenClaw商业化落地案例

top_items.relevance: OpenClaw商业化 - 本地商家自动化服务
top_items.suggested_angle: 询问实际转化率数据和客户对AI生成网站的接受程度

js_take.en-US: This is a solid business model. What's the actual conversion rate like—how many businesses go from 'free preview' to paid? Curious if local business owners are skeptical about AI-generated sites or if the low price overcomes that.
js_take.zh-CN: This is a solid business model. What's the actual conversion rate like—how many businesses go from 'free preview' to paid? Curious if local business owners are skeptical about AI-generated sites or if the low price overcomes that.

top_items.author: @geekbb

title.en-US: ZeroClaw Rust rewrite vs OpenClaw: 3.4MB vs 28MB, 0s vs 5.98s, 7.8MB vs 1.52GB
title.zh-CN: 用Rust重写的ZeroClaw性能对比OpenClaw：体积缩小8倍，启动时间从5.98秒降至0秒，内存占用从1.52GB降至7.8MB

summary.zh-CN: 235赞382收藏24回复的高互动，展示OpenClaw生态的Rust替代方案，性能对比极具冲击力

top_items.suggested_angle: 询问ZeroClaw在MCP协议兼容性和技能生态系统上的完整度
